abstract: The HID specification compliant unit code for this element.

## Discussion

The unit code specifies the physical units for the physical value, such as Seconds or Amperes.

See the HID specification for more details: [https://www.usb.org/hid].

# unit

**Instance Property**

The HID specification compliant unit code for this element.

## Declaration

```swift
var unit: UInt32?
```

## Discussion

The unit code specifies the physical units for the physical value, such as Seconds or Amperes.

See the HID specification for more details: [https://www.usb.org/hid].
title: unit
